original_title: Calum Noah: The Very First Sword Dance
overview: Where, when and by whom was the highland sword dance first invented? We think it was danced by Noah's son Calum, when the Ark hit dry land. Calum Noah takes a playful look at the origins of the sword dance, telling a long-forgotten tale from the Isle of Skye.
title: Calum Noah: The Very First Sword Dance
